message: Starting critique review - gathering phase handover and agent findings
Found critical issue - DUPLICATE REVIEW SPAWNING. 7 agents spawned (4 reviewers + 2 critiques) instead of 3 (2 reviewers + 1 critique). Examining SQLite migration code

Confirmed root cause found by peer. THREE concurrent paths call _auto_spawn_phase_reviewers: (1) update_agent_progress:3572, (2) retry worker:3517, (3) submit_phase_for_review:4506. Preparing critique submission

Critique analysis completed. CANNOT submit formal critique due to SQLite schema bug ('no such column: final_verdict'). Key findings reported: (1) Duplicate review spawning race condition - 3 concurrent paths call _auto_spawn_phase_reviewers causing 7 agents instead of 3. (2) Submit_critique tool broken - SQLite migration incomplete. Phase deliverables technically met but exposed critical production bugs requiring immediate fix.
